body_html:
@t-vi Can you look at this one too? Sounds like we forgot to put ifdefs to guard the CuDNN CTCLoss implementation based on version. (Not sure why CI didn't catch it, I guess we're not actually testing against cuDNN 6)

UPDATE: We are testing against cuDNN 6... that's weird!

body:
@t-vi Can you look at this one too? Sounds like we forgot to put ifdefs to guard the CuDNN CTCLoss implementation based on version. (Not sure why CI didn't catch it, I guess we're not actually testing against cuDNN 6)

UPDATE: We are testing against cuDNN 6... that's weird!
